title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package directions.
Fry pancetta until crispy.
Whisk eggs, grated Parmesan, and black pepper.
Combine hot spaghetti with egg mixture and pancetta.
Serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Sauté onions, garlic, and ginger.
Add chicken and brown.
Stir in tomatoes and curry powder.
Pour in coconut milk and simmer until chicken is cooked through.
Serve with rice.

title: Vegetable Lasagna
summary: Layers of pasta, rich tomato sauce, and a variety of fresh vegetables, baked to perfection.
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Cook lasagna noodles al dente.
Layer noodles, ricotta mixture, spinach, and marinara sauce in a baking dish.
Top with mozzarella cheese.
Bake for 30 minutes, or until bubbly and golden.

title: Beef Stir-Fry
summary: Quick and easy stir-fry with tender beef strips and crisp vegetables in a savory sauce.
instructions: Heat oil in a large skillet or wok.
Add beef and stir-fry until browned.
Add vegetables and stir-fry until tender-crisp.
Stir in soy sauce, ginger, and garlic.
Serve immediately with rice.

title: Chocolate Lava Cake
summary: A decadent dessert with a molten chocolate center, perfect for any occasion.
instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C).
Melt chocolate and butter together.
Whisk eggs and sugar until light.
Fold in flour and chocolate mixture.
Pour into ramekins and bake for 12-14 minutes.
Serve warm with ice cream.
